About.sobre: I‚Äôm a junior software developer with around 1 year of hands-on experience, working as an intern and contributing to real-world solutions. I'm currently studying Systems Analysis and Development at Universidade Paulista (UNIP), Manaus campus. I have experience with web and mobile development using technologies like React, React Native, Node.js, SQL, MongoDB, Next.js, and TypeScript. I stand out for my curiosity, initiative, and ability to quickly learn new tools. I'm constantly striving to grow professionally and build products that solve real problems.

Project1.title: My Portfolio

Project2.title: Restaurant Management
Project2.description: This is a restaurant management and service system project called HEST. Developed with React, Node, Tailwind, MySQL.

Project3.title: FoodBoxd
Project3.description: FoodBoxd is a menu and review management system for cafeterias, developed in React Native with Firebase integration. It allows managers to create and edit daily/weekly menus, monitor user feedback, and view performance charts. Users can check menus, rate meals, and view nutritional info.

Project4.title: Blog Viewreo
Project4.description: I built a full-stack blog using Next.js, MongoDB, NextAuth, and Prisma. Users can securely authenticate, create and view posts, and interact with content. The solution features authentication with NextAuth, data management with MongoDB and Prisma, and a responsive UI built with React. Tech stack: Next.js, React, MongoDB, NextAuth, Prisma.

Project5.title: Planno Landing Page
Project5.description: üíº I created this landing page using Vite + React, focusing on performance, responsiveness, and a clear user experience. It introduces Planno, a personal finance control solution, in a modern and attractive way. üöÄ

Project6.title: üå∏ Takusan - Discover Animes
Project6.description: üéå Takusan is a web app that lets you explore the most popular animes, view full details like trailers, characters, and genres, and navigate a modern and animated UI. Built with React, Vite, TailwindCSS, GraphQL, and Framer Motion, this project focuses on user experience and performance.
